Introduction

Siyoon is a South Korean rapper, dancer, and singer under MYSTIC Story. She is a member of the girl group Billlie and its sub unit Moon Sua X Siyoon.

In October 2019, alongside fellow member Tsuki, Siyoon participated in the third season of the Japanese magazine Popteen' survival show called 'Popteen Cover Girl War'. This made her a regular model for Popteen starting November 2019.

She was a member of the trainee group Mystic Rookies, who later became Billlie, with whom she made her debut on November 10, 2021 with the release of the mini album "The Billage of Perception : Chapter One".
